name: Pastoor Jurg Sondag 20 April
chorusText:
Search me, oh God
and know my heart, today
try me,oSaviour
and know my thoughts, I pray
see if there be some wicked way in me
cleanse me from every sin
and set me free
There’s a gladness in my soul today
praise the Lord, praise the Lord
for my many sins are washed away
HalleluJaH, praise the Lord
I’ll go singing on my way
for my night has turned to day
and forever by His side I’ll stay
HalleluJaH, Praise the Lord
Oh! What a change (X2)
Oh! What a change in my life
 Oh! What a change (X2)
Oh! What a change in my life

Iv’e got Jesus on the inside
moving on the outside
bringing about a change in my life	 X2
This old world can never hold me
Any moment I’ll be gone
For I’ve made my consecration 
And I have my wedding garments on
Yesterday, today and forever
Jesus is the same
All may change but Jesus never
Glory to His Name

 Glory to His Name, Glory to His Name
 All may change but Jesus never
Glory to His Name.
Majesty C

Majesty, worship His Majesty
unto Jesus be glory honour and praise
Majesty, Kingdom Authority
flows from His throne unto His own
His anthems raise
so exalt, lift up on high
the name of Jesus
magnify, come glorify
Christ Jesus the King
Majesty, worship His Majesty
Jesus who died, now glorified
King of all kings
NOBODY LIKE THEE, LORD, NOBODY LIKE THEE
DO KEEP ME HUMBLE, DO KEEP ME TRUE
ALL THROUGH LIFE's JOURNEY, He’ll CARRY ME THROUGH
NOBODY LIKE THEE, LORD, NOBODY LIKE THEE
Niemandsoos Jesus, niemandsoosHy
Hyhou my nedrig, Hyhou my trou
Hy is die Vader, Hy is die Seun
Niemandsoos Jesus, niemandsoosHy
Die oorwinningslied.
Eksien in my gees die glorie
en die almag van die Heer
die Allerhoogstewat in liefde
oorSykoninkrykregeer
Hy’tbeloweaan die einde
op die wolkekomHyweer
Hy is Koning, Hyregeer

Koor: LoofHom, prysHom. HalleluJaH     x3
Hy is Koning, Hyregeer
Die Here is ons vesting
watviraltydsalblystaan
Hybeskermelkemens
wat in geloofnaHom toe gaan
Hy’sonsSkuilingHy’sonsWapen
Hy’t die vyand reeds verslaan
Hy’s die Rots watewigstaan

Koor: LoofHom, prysHom, HalleluJaH   x3
Hy’s die Rots watewigstaan
Komdeelnou in onsloflied
Hefjouhande op nabo
Blaasbasuineslaan op tromme
En komdansvoor God se oё
Komleef in die oorwinning
Van SyWoordwaarinonsglo
Want SyWoordsalewigstaan

Koor: LoofHom, prysHom, halleluJaH    x3
Want SyWoordsalewigstaan
